title: Assassin’s Creed Fans Can Enjoy Middle-Earth: Shadow of War on PS Plus Extra
description: Sony has announced the addition of “Middle-earth: Shadow of War” to its PlayStation Plus Extra subscription service. This inclusion, particularly noteworthy during the festive season, offers subscribers access to the popular title at no additional cost. The game, typically priced at £34.99, is now available for free to PlayStation Plus Extra members, with this offer […]
